definitions.title: vb. Pu.
definitions.body: be intertwined (Talm. [[סָרַג]] Pi. enmesh, weave around; Aram. srag intertwine, involve, [[סְרַג]] entwine; Ar. 4araja set in order, join, weave, mix);—Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְשׂרָָגוּ]] Job 40:17 are intertwined (of sinews of hippopot.).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִשְׂתָּֽרְגוּ]] La 1:14 they intertwine themselves (fig. of [[פְּשְׁעַי]]).
